signature: Bag<E> transformedBag(Bag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformingBag(Bag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a transformed bag with a transformer, but transformedBag also transforms existing elements.
Both methods require a transformer to be initialized and used for transformations.
Environment setup for the bag is required before transforming it.
Validation of the bag is necessary before transforming it to ensure it is not null.
